About Us

Learn more about BulkySoftware and our mission

We're Revolutionizing WhatsApp Business Solutions

BulkySoftware was founded in 2018 with a simple mission: to provide businesses with reliable, scalable, and affordable WhatsApp solutions. Today, we serve over 5,000 businesses worldwide.

Our platform is built on cutting-edge technology that ensures maximum deliverability and engagement for your WhatsApp campaigns.

Advanced features for enterprise-level WhatsApp communication

No Blocking Issues

Our advanced algorithms and compliance measures ensure your accounts remain safe and active. We follow WhatsApp's official guidelines to prevent blocking.

No Account Scan Needed

Unlike other solutions, we don't require access to your personal WhatsApp account. Our business API solution works independently.

High Performance

Send thousands of messages per minute with our high-throughput API. Perfect for large-scale marketing campaigns and notifications.

24/7 Support

Our dedicated support team is available round the clock to help you with any issues or questions about the API.

Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about our services

How does the credit system work?

Each credit allows you to send one message. Different message types may use different credit amounts. For example, text messages use 1 credit, while media messages may use 2 credits. You can purchase credit packages based on your needs.

Is there a risk of my account getting blocked?

We follow WhatsApp's official guidelines and have implemented advanced compliance measures to minimize the risk of blocking. Our system monitors sending patterns and ensures you stay within acceptable limits. In the rare event of an issue, our support team will help resolve it quickly.

Can I integrate with my existing CRM?

Yes! Our WhatsApp Business API can be integrated with most popular CRM systems through our REST API. We also offer pre-built connectors for platforms like Salesforce, HubSpot, and Zoho. Our technical team can assist with custom integrations if needed.

What kind of support do you offer?

We offer multiple support channels including email, live chat, and phone support. Response times vary by plan: Starter (24 hours), Business (4 hours), Enterprise (1 hour). Our knowledge base and documentation are available 24/7 for self-service support.

Do you offer a free trial?

Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial with 100 credits to test our platform. No credit card required for the trial. You can upgrade to a paid plan at any time during or after the trial period.
